snippet: Detectives cannot complete their investigation into the fatal sinking near Oyster Bay on Wednesday until they see the boat.
abstract: Long Island police have called in a dive team from the Federal Bureau of Investigation to help them recover a boat that capsized and sank in Long Island Sound near Oyster Bay on July 4, killing three children; police officials say they will not know enough about the accident to recommend whether prosecutors should press any criminal charges until the vessel is recovered.
lead_paragraph: Detectives cannot complete their investigation into the fatal sinking near Oyster Bay on Wednesday until they see the boat.

headline.seo: Long Island Police Call In F.B.I. Divers to Recover Boat
headline.main: F.B.I. Divers Called In to Recover Boat
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Divers Called In to Recover Boat
